SEARCH
Module VetAppointmentPortal
Package com.vetportal.service

Class CustomerService

java.lang.Object
com.vetportal.service.CustomerService
public class CustomerService extends Object
Service layer responsible for customer-related business logic.

Delegates database operations to the EmployeeDAO and wraps results in ServiceResponse objects to include status and error handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerService

      public CustomerService(Connection conn)
      Constructs a new CustomerService using the given database connection. Initializes CustomerDAO and PetDAO for customer and pet operations.
      Parameters:
      conn - an active SQL database connection

      Creates a new customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to create
      Returns:
      a service response containing the created customer or an error

    • updateCustomer

      public boolean updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates an existing customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to update
      Returns:
      true if the customer was updated, false otherwise

    • deleteCustomer

      public boolean deleteCustomer(int customerID)
      Deletes a customer and all associated pets from the database. Relies on foreign key constraints for cascade deletion.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer to delete
      Returns:
      true if the customer was deleted, false otherwise
